title: Personal Assistants
text: AI and ML algorithms drive personal assistants like Siri, Alexa, and Google Assistant. These digital companions understand and respond to natural language, making them invaluable for tasks ranging from setting reminders to answering questions.

title: Autonomous Vehicles
text: AI and ML are at the heart of self-driving cars. These vehicles use sensors and real-time data to make split-second decisions, enhancing safety and reducing the need for human intervention on the road.

title: Chatbots for Customer Support
text: Many companies employ AI-powered chatbots to provide instant customer support. These chatbots use ML to understand user queries and offer solutions, improving response times and customer satisfaction.
